title: NEW Zambos Tostones coming in 2023!
content: The most famous plantain slices in Honduras now bring you the flavor of tradition, with the NEW Zambos Tostones. Exquisite and in the best homemade style, itâ€™s time for you to try Tostones just the way you like them! Traditional and made for you, with 0% cholesterol, sugar free and gluten free. To pamper yourself with a tasty snack, just like you deserve. You can also prepare them and combine them with whatever you prefer. We recommend you to accompany them with one of our most famous recipes and a delicacy par excellence of the Catracho food: Anafre with Tostones Zambos. Run for yours and try them as you like! New Zambos Tostones.*Product valid only for Honduras.
